quote: I think it's important to get your surroundings as well as yourself into a positive state - meaning surround yourself with positive people, not the kind who are negative and jealous of everything you do.
author: Heidi Klum

quote: Life is one big road with lots of signs. So when you riding through the ruts, don't complicate your mind. Flee from hate, mischief and jealousy. Don't bury your thoughts, put your vision to reality. Wake Up and Live!
author: Bob Marley

quote: Jealousy is the tribute mediocrity pays to genius.
author: Fulton J. Sheen

quote: Never underestimate the power of jealousy and the power of envy to destroy. Never underestimate that.
author: Oliver Stone

quote: You can be the moon and still be jealous of the stars.
author: Gary Allan

quote: Jealousy is the fear of comparison.
author: Max Frisch

quote: There is no greater glory than love, nor any greater punishment than jealousy.
author: Lope de Vega

quote: The jealous are possessed by a mad devil and a dull spirit at the same time.
author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quote: As iron is eaten away by rust, so the envious are consumed by their own passion.
author: Antisthenes

quote: Don't waste time on jealousy. Sometimes you're ahead, sometimes you're behind.
author: Mary Schmich

quote: The jealous are troublesome to others, but a torment to themselves.
author: William Penn

quote: He that is jealous is not in love.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Jealousy is both reasonable and belongs to reasonable men, while envy is base and belongs to the base, for the one makes himself get good things by jealousy, while the other does not allow his neighbour to have them through envy.
author: Aristotle

quote: Jealousy is the jaundice of the soul.
author: John Dryden

quote: It will be found an unjust and unwise jealousy to deprive a man of his natural liberty upon the supposition he may abuse it.
author: George Washington

quote: There is never jealousy where there is not strong regard.
author: Washington Irving

quote: It is not love that is blind, but jealousy.
author: Lawrence Durrell

quote: Jealousy is no more than feeling alone against smiling enemies.
author: Elizabeth Bowen

quote: Jealousy... is a mental cancer.
author: B. C. Forbes

quote: More men die of jealousy than of cancer.
author: Joseph P. Kennedy

quote: Jealousy is all the fun you think they had.
author: Erica Jong

quote: Jealousy contains more of self-love than of love.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: A negative judgment gives you more satisfaction than praise, provided it smacks of jealousy.
author: Jean Baudrillard

quote: Moral indignation is jealousy with a halo.
author: H. G. Wells

quote: The envious die not once, but as oft as the envied win applause.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: Those who enjoy their own emotionally bad health and who habitually fill their own minds with the rank poisons of suspicion, jealousy and hatred, as a rule take umbrage at those who refuse to do likewise, and they find a perverted relief in trying to denigrate them.
author: Johannes Brahms

quote: Those who are believed to be most abject and humble are usually most ambitious and envious.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: That's the way I got along in life. I don't ever remember being particularly jealous of anybody, because I figured if I can't do it myself, I don't deserve to get it.
author: Clyde Tombaugh

quote: To jealousy, nothing is more frightful than laughter.
author: Francoise Sagan

quote: Love shouldn't be about jealousy or anything like that. It should be about commitment and being able to trust that person. If you can't have that from the get-go, there's a problem.
author: Aaron Carter

quote: The knives of jealousy are honed on details.
author: Ruth Rendell

quote: Jealousy is the fear or apprehension of superiority: envy our uneasiness under it.
author: William Shenstone

quote: My wife's jealousy is getting ridiculous. The other day she looked at my calendar and wanted to know who May was.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: Jealousy is the tie that binds, and binds, and binds.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: Hunger, revenge, to sleep are petty foes, But only death the jealous eyes can close.
author: William Wycherley

quote: Jealousy is never satisfied with anything short of an omniscience that would detect the subtlest fold of the heart.
author: George Eliot

quote: Nothing is more capable of troubling our reason, and consuming our health, than secret notions of jealousy in solitude.
author: Aphra Behn

quote: Jealousy is a dog's bark which attracts thieves.
author: Karl Kraus

quote: Jealousy, that dragon which slays love under the pretence of keeping it alive.
author: Havelock Ellis

quote: There's no regret. You can't regret. I mean, I've felt regret but I've also refused to allow regret to sow a seed and live in me because I don't believe it. You feel it, it's like guilt, it's like jealousy, it's like all those horrible things. You've just got to snip them and get them out, because they're no good.
author: Jude Law

quote: Like hatred, jealousy is forbidden by the laws of life because it is essentially destructive.
author: Alexis Carrel

quote: Jealousy is, I think, the worst of all faults because it makes a victim of both parties.
author: Gene Tierney

quote: Jealousy is the grave of affection.
author: Mary Baker Eddy

quote: The lovesick, the betrayed, and the jealous all smell alike.
author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quote: Passion can quickly slip to jealousy, or even hatred.
author: Arthur Golden

quote: Jealousy - that jumble of secret worship and ostensible aversion.
author: Emil Cioran

quote: I would rather drudge out my life on a cotton plantation, till the grave opened to give me rest, than to live with an unprincipled master and a jealous mistress.
author: Harriet Ann Jacobs

quote: Magnanimous people have no vanity, they have no jealousy, and they feed on the true and the solid wherever they find it. And, what is more, they find it everywhere.
author: Van Wyck Brooks

quote: Jealousy is cruel as the grave: the coals thereof are coals of fire.
author: Solomon Ibn Gabirol

quote: I have never been jealous. Not even when my dad finished fifth grade a year before I did.
author: Jeff Foxworthy

quote: Jealous, adj. Unduly concerned about the preservation of that which can be lost only if not worth keeping.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: But I like not these great success of yours; for I know how jealous are the gods.
author: Herodotus

quote: Man is jealous because of his amour propre; woman is jealous because of her lack of it.
author: Germaine Greer

quote: I am drawn to women who are independent and creative, which is problematic because it's a struggle, a competition of careers. There's jealousy.
author: Marilyn Manson

quote: If one of two lovers is loyal, and the other jealous and false, how may their friendship last, for Love is slain!
author: Marie de France

quote: People are taken aback by a confident, pretty girl who knows what she wants in life and isn't going to let anyone get in her way. And you know what it's all about? Jealousy.
author: Summer Altice

quote: A competent and self-confident person is incapable of jealousy in anything. Jealousy is invariably a symptom of neurotic insecurity.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: I'm not really easy to live with! There needs to be unlimited patience and unconditional love. Men I've known before loved my independent spirit and were proud of my success, to the point that they'd become jealous of the time I devote to my career.
author: Milla Jovovich

quote: From heresy, frenzy and jealousy, good Lord deliver me.
author: Ludovico Ariosto

quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own... Jealousy is a disease, love is a healthy condition. The immature mind often mistakes one for the other, or assumes that the greater the love, the greater the jealousy.
author: Robert A. Heinlein
